text: The 1907 Italian Athletics Championships were held in Rome. it was the 2nd edition of the Italian Athletics Championships. ==Champions== Dorando Pietri won two national title in this edition. {| class="wikitable" width=40% style="font-size:100%; text-align:center;" |-align=center !Event !!Athlete!!Performance |- |align=left|100 m ||align=left|Umberto Barozzi || 11.7 |- |align=left|400 m ||align=left|Umberto Barozzi || 54.0 |- |align=left|1000 m ||align=left|Massimo Cartasegna || 2:47".00 |- |align=left|5000 m ||align=left|Dorando Pietri || 16:27.1/5 |- |align=left|||align=left|Dorando Pietri || 1:06'27" |- |align=left|110 m hs ||align=left|Giovanni Pinzi-Reynaud || 21.1/5 |- |align=left|1500 m walk ||align=left|Antonio Pittarello || 7:00.1/5 |- |align=left|10,000 m walk ||align=left|Arturo Balestrieri || 48:48.0 |} == References == == External links == * Italian Athletics Federation Italian Athletics Championships Category:Italian Athletics Outdoor Championships Category:1907 in Italian sport
title: 1907 Italian Athletics Championships
